name: GeoSwitch (Spacespy)
description:
In GeoSwitch you'll be constantly switching colors to avoid the endless barrage of bullets heading your way. With a retro simplistic look and music taking you back to the past you'll be sure to Die. DIE. DIE again.


Features

- 15 stages of pure action.

- A unique geometric artstyle

- High quality music made in just 3 days

- So much BLOO- I mean goo, yes goo

- Different patterns providing a Fresh Challenge

Follow me on twitter for More updates...
